name: tm67
effect: Teaches Recycle to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Retaliate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Recycle)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user recycles a single-use item
that has been used in battle so it can
be used again.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user recycles a single-use item
that has been used in battle so it can
be used again.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user recycles a single-use item
that has been used in battle so it can
be used again.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally. If an ally fainted in the previous
turn, this attack’s damage increases.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally. If an ally fainted in the previous
turn, this attack’s damage increases.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally.
If an ally fainted in the previous turn,
this move becomes more powerful.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user stabs the target with a sharp horn.
The attack never misses.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user stabs the target with a sharp horn.
The attack never misses.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user stabs the target with a sharp horn.
The attack never misses.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.
